content: designed and made to match the baby orange dinosaur toy see https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/baby-dinosaur-5 for my little boy s next birthday this pattern provides instructions to make a dinosaur beanie - in sizes from newborn to adult please note sizes are only a guide individual head size may vary the only additional material required is a darning needle with which to weave in the ends if you have quite a tight crochet gauge i would suggest using a hook that is 5 mm larger in order to obtain a similar gauge
